mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FETCH_PERSON_INFO ( ID, IDCARDNUMBER, INAME, CURRENTPAGEINDEX, REGDATE, EXPORTED, EXPORTEDDATE, FETCHDATE, PAGEINDEX, DISRUPTTYPENAME, SEXY, CASECODE, AREANAME, COURTNAME, DUTY, PARTYTYPENAME, GISTUNIT, PERFORMANCE, AGE, GISTID, PUBLISHDATE, CARDNUM, FOCUSNUMBER ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idCardNumber}, #{iname}, #{currentPageIndex}, #{regDate}, #{exported}, #{exportedDate}, #{fetchDate}, #{pageIndex}, #{disruptTypeName}, #{sexy}, #{caseCode}, #{areaName}, #{courtName}, #{duty}, #{partyTypeName}, #{gistUnit}, #{performance}, #{age}, #{gistId}, #{publishDate}, #{cardNum}, #{focusNumber} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM FETCH_PERSON_INFO WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE FETCH_PERSON_INFO
IDCARDNUMBER = #{idCardNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
INAME = #{iname,javaType=java.lang.String},
CURRENTPAGEINDEX = #{currentPageIndex,javaType=int},
REGDATE = #{regDate,javaType=java.lang.String},
EXPORTED = #{exported,javaType=boolean},
EXPORTEDDATE = #{exportedDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
FETCHDATE = #{fetchDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PAGEINDEX = #{pageIndex,javaType=int},
DISRUPTTYPENAME = #{disruptTypeName,javaType=java.lang.String},
SEXY = #{sexy,javaType=java.lang.String},
CASECODE = #{caseCode,javaType=java.lang.String},
AREANAME = #{areaName,javaType=java.lang.String},
COURTNAME = #{courtName,javaType=java.lang.String},
DUTY = #{duty,javaType=java.lang.String},
PARTYTYPENAME = #{partyTypeName,javaType=java.lang.String},
GISTUNIT = #{gistUnit,javaType=java.lang.String},
PERFORMANCE = #{performance,javaType=java.lang.String},
AGE = #{age,javaType=java.lang.String},
GISTID = #{gistId,javaType=java.lang.String},
PUBLISHDATE = #{publishDate,javaType=java.lang.String},
CARDNUM = #{cardNum,javaType=java.lang.String},
FOCUSNUMBER = #{focusNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE ID = #{id}
